General.Name: Trilogiq
General.Description: Trilogiq S.A. designs and manufactures modular systems for automotive companies in France and internationally. It offers cantilevers, workstations, flow racks, trolleys, display units, shelves and storage, and conveyors; and components, such as connectors, supports, tubes, rails, guides, castors, screws, and accessories. Trilogiq S.A. was founded in 1992 and is based in Cergy-Pontoise, France.
